document_data.mainbody:
Burning Shield Lane was a road that crossed the entirety of The Shutters neighborhood in the Crows End District of Ravens Bluff from north to south, and ended in the Pumpside neighborhood.
Mraedaras Street was only four city blocks in length. It began at Karen Court in The Shutters in the north, and moved straight south, crossing Hammerstone Street, a moot where it met Samarglast Lane and Drovers Run, crossed Conant Court, and ended at Kalikoolan Lane.
